titleStmt.title: The A, B, C. Or, A catechisme for yong [sic] children. Appoynted by act of the Church and Councell of Scotland, to be learned in all families and lector schooles in the said kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
On t.p.: "Printed by Authoritie ... Cum Privilegio."
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
